name: EkstraBladetPrintable
description: Print articles from ekstrabladet.dk in a more compact and flexible way, also printing the stars in music reviews well.  Removes header, footers, almost all images and more, and allows wide lines of automatically wrapping text at any printing scale.

user.name: dknyt
user.about: Danish Firefox user on Fedora Linux

additional_info:
* 20180510 r4.0.0: Major revision & cleanup for new web design

* 20160310 r3.2.1: Show wine rating stars again (site fixed design bug)

* 20160304 r3.2.0: Updated to current design of music & wine rating stars

* 20150718 r3.1.0: Remove Facebook posts more completely (extra space)

* 20150718 r3.0.0: Updated to current design (more stuff to get rid of)

* 20141204 r2.1.0: Optimize vertical spacing around top lines a bit more

* 20141101 r2.0.0: Display top date because the bottom one is gone

* 20140927 r1.0.0: First public release
